channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [SATCH] Satchmo Holdings Ltd Completes De-subsidization of Marathalli Ventures Private Limited
item.description:
Satchmo Holdings Ltd has completed the de-subsidization of its wholly owned subsidiary, Marathalli Ventures Private Limited (MVPL), following the approval from shareholders on February 23, 2022. The de-subsidization was subject to the completion of a final one-time settlement with the existing lender or receipt of a no-objection certificate (NOC). Satchmo Holdings Ltd has successfully settled its debt with the existing lender and executed a Share Purchase Agreement for the sale of its holdings in MVPL. As a result, MVPL has ceased to be a subsidiary of the Company with immediate effect. Satchmo Holdings Ltd will provide handholding support during the transition period and bear sole responsibility for the satisfaction and performance of certain conditions precedent and conditions subsequent.

  • Shareholders of Satchmo Holdings Ltd approved the de-subsidization of Marathalli Ventures Private Limited on February 23, 2022
  • Satchmo Holdings Ltd has settled its debt with the existing lender and executed a Share Purchase Agreement for the sale of its holdings in MVPL
  • Marathalli Ventures Private Limited has ceased to be a subsidiary of Satchmo Holdings Ltd with immediate effect
  • Satchmo Holdings Ltd will provide handholding support during the transition period
  • Satchmo Holdings Ltd is responsible for the satisfaction and performance of certain conditions precedent and conditions subsequent

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Satchmo Holdings Ltd | Category: Deals

item.title: [BLBLIMITED] BLB Limited Incorporates Wholly Owned Subsidiary, BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

BLB Limited has incorporated a Wholly Owned Subsidiary, BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited, with the Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Government of India issuing the Certificate of Incorporation on January 10, 2026. The new subsidiary will engage in property, real estate business including purchase, sale, and construction and other allied activities. The objective of incorporating the WOS is to diversify and expand the current business operations, making the Company more agile and diversified. BLB Limited will hold 100% share capital of BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited.

  • BLB Limited incorporates a Wholly Owned Subsidiary, BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited
  • BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited registered with Registrar of Companies, Delhi & NCT
  • New subsidiary to engage in property, real estate business
  • Objective is to diversify and expand current business operations
  • BLB Limited to hold 100% share capital of BLB Growth Ventures Private Limited

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: BLB LTD. | Category: New Launch

item.title: [SATCH] Satchmo Holdings Commissions Food Factory for Packaged Food Production
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Satchmo Holdings Ltd has successfully commissioned its manufacturing facility (Food Factory) for production of packaged food items, including idli & dosa batter, ready-to-make-chapati, sweets and other snacks items. The subsidiary has commenced operations and started production for sampling and testing purposes. The first set of packaged food products is expected to be launched in the market during this quarter. The Company has made a substantial capital expenditure (CAPEX) investment in the subsidiary towards establishing the initial production capacity of the aforesaid food manufacturing facility.

  • Satchmo Holdings commissions food factory for packaged food production
  • Initial production capacity established with CAPEX investment
  • Production started for sampling and testing purposes
  • First set of packaged food products expected to be launched this quarter
  • Significant step in Satchmo's strategic expansion into the food industry

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Satchmo Holdings Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [GISOLUTION] Teamo Productions HQ Ltd to Approve Unaudited Financial Results for Q3 & Nine Months Ended Dec 31, 2025
item.description:
Teamo Productions HQ Ltd has announced a meeting of the Board of Directors on January 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025. The trading window for dealing in securities of the company remains closed for the Designated Persons and their immediate relatives till the expiry of 48 hours after the declaration of un-audited financial results.

  • Teamo Productions HQ Ltd to consider and approve unaudited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended Dec 31, 2025
  • The meeting of the Board of Directors is scheduled on Jan 14, 2026
  • Trading window for dealing in securities of the company remains closed for Designated Persons and their immediate relatives
  • The closure of the trading window will last till the expiry of 48 hours after the declaration of un-audited financial results

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: GI ENGINEERING SOLUTIONS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [INFY*] Infosys Science Foundation Honors Outstanding Researchers with the Infosys Prize 2025
item.description:
The Infosys Science Foundation (ISF) awarded the winners of the Infosys Prize 2025 at a felicitation ceremony in Bengaluru. The prize, now in its 17th year, recognizes researchers under the age of 40 and includes a pure gold medal, a citation, and a prize purse of USD 100,000. The winners were felicitated by Nobel laureate Randy Schekman across six categories: Economics, Engineering and Computer Science, Humanities and Social Sciences, Life Sciences, Mathematical Sciences, and Physical Sciences.

  • The Infosys Prize 2025 recognizes exceptional researchers under the age of 40 across six categories.
  • Winners were awarded a pure gold medal, a citation, and a prize purse of USD 100,000.
  • The awards were presented by Nobel laureate Randy Schekman.
  • The Infosys Science Foundation has been awarding the Infosys Prize since 2009.
  • The prize aims to celebrate success in research and stand as a marker of excellence in various fields.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: INFOSYS LTD. | Category: Award

item.title: [RAILTEL] RailTel Corporation of India Ltd Announces Changes in Senior Management Personnel
item.description:
RailTel Corporation of India Ltd has announced changes in its senior management personnel. Dr. Sharad Sharma, Sh. Deepak Prakash, and Sh. Ramphool Garg have been re-designated, pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SE BI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. Dr. Sharma, who was the Executive Director, will no longer be part of the senior management. Similarly, Sh. Deepak Prakash and Sh. Ramphool Garg, who were Pr. Executive Directors, will also not be part of the senior management. However, they will continue with the Company in their new roles as ED/TM/ADI/WR/RCIL, ED/POM/NR/RCIL, and ED/TM/Jaipur/NR/RCIL respectively. These changes will be effective from January 10, 2026.

  • RailTel Corporation of India Ltd announces changes in senior management personnel
  • Dr. Sharad Sharma, Sh. Deepak Prakash, and Sh. Ramphool Garg have been re-designated
  • Dr. Sharma, Sh. Deepak Prakash, and Sh. Ramphool Garg will no longer be part of the senior management
  • Dr. Sharma, Sh. Deepak Prakash, and Sh. Ramphool Garg will continue with the Company in their new roles
  • Changes will be effective from January 10, 2026

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: RailTel Corporation of India Ltd | Category: Management Change

item.title: [SCHAND] S Chand and Company Ltd Acquires 100% Stake in CPD Singapore Education Services Pte. Limited for SGD 1,500,000
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

S Chand and Company Ltd, through its wholly owned subsidiary New Saraswati House (India) Private Limited, has agreed to acquire 100% ownership in CPD Singapore Education Services Pte. Limited for a total consideration of SGD 1,500,000. CPD Singapore is a Singapore-based provider of education-support services and publisher of International Curriculum (IB/IGCSE) school books. The acquisition is structured to be completed in two tranches. Upon completion, CPD Singapore will become a step-down subsidiary of S Chand and Company Ltd. The transaction does not fall under related party transactions and no promoter/promoter group/group companies have interest in this transaction.

  • S Chand and Company Ltd to acquire 100% stake in CPD Singapore Education Services Pte. Limited
  • Transaction value of SGD 1,500,000 (Singapore Dollars One Million Five Hundred Thousand)
  • Acquisition to be completed in two tranches
  • CPD Singapore provides education-support services and publishes International Curriculum (IB/IGCSE) school books
  • No related party transactions involved

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: S Chand and Company Ltd | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [ORIENTCEM] Orient Cement Ltd Shifts Registered Office from Orissa to Gujarat
item.description:
Orient Cement Limited has informed the Stock Exchange about the change in its Registered Office address. Highway, Anmedabad - 382421, Gujaratâ€™ effective from 9th January, 2026. This shift follows a special resolution to alter the provisions of its Memorandum of Association with respect to the place of the Registered Office.

item.title: [ELNET] Elnet Technologies Ltd. to Appoint Mrs. A.R. Rajalakshmi as Non-Executive Director
item.description:
Elnet Technologies Limited has called for an Extra-Ordinary General Meeting (EGM) to appoint Mrs. A.R. Rajalakshmi as a Non-Executive Director. The EGM is scheduled to be held on Tuesday, February 03, 2026, at 11:30 A.M. (IST) through Video Conferencing (â€˜VCâ€™)/ Other Audio-Visual Means (â€˜OAVMâ€™). The notice of the EGM has been sent to all the members of the Company whose email addresses are registered with the Company or Depositories or Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of the Company. The remote e-voting period commences on Friday, January 30, 2026 at 9.00 a.m. (IST) and ends on Monday, February 02, 2026 5.00 p.m. (IST).

  • Elnet Technologies Limited has called for an EGM to appoint Mrs. A.R. Rajalakshmi as a Non-Executive Director.
  • The EGM will be held on Tuesday, February 03, 2026, at 11:30 A.M. (IST) through VC/OAVM.
  • The notice of the EGM has been sent to all registered members.
  • The remote e-voting period commences on Friday, January 30, 2026 at 9.00 a.m. (IST) and ends on Monday, February 02, 2026 5.00 p.m. (IST).
